SEARCH

Package Service.MediaItem

package Service.MediaItem
Services for managing media items across the catalog.

Supports creation, search, and reporting functions such as overdue counts. Keeps business rules centralized and independent of presentation concerns.

Responsibilities

  • Add and register new media items.
  • Search through media items using flexible criteria.
  • Compute and expose summary metrics (e.g., overdue totals).
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Service
    Application service layer orchestrating business use-cases.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    MediaItemSearchService
    Provides unified search functionality across all media item types (books and CDs) using different search strategies.
    MediaItemService
    Service for managing media items in the system.
    OverDueCountService
    Service for counting overdue borrowed media items.
